content:
Hey! I am a student of PhD programme at Astronomical Institute of Wrocław University. My interest are concentrated at stellar atmospheres modelling and machine learning applications in astronomy.
As a visitor of this webpage you may find some information about the HANDY (code useful for spectrum normalization process - see more at HANDY page) or probably some of my teaching materials.

title: Tomasz Różański
